checks.title: Store entrance clean and inviting
checks.description: Verify entrance doors, mats, and immediate entry area are clean and welcoming
checks.pass_criteria: Clean doors, fresh mats, organized entrance area
checks.fail_criteria: Dirty doors, worn mats, or cluttered entrance
checks.image_prompt: Photo of store entrance from outside looking in

checks.title: Aisles clear and easy to navigate
checks.description: Check that main aisles are free of obstacles and properly lit
checks.pass_criteria: Clear pathways, no carts/boxes blocking flow, good lighting
checks.fail_criteria: Blocked aisles, poor lighting, or difficult navigation

checks.title: Product signage accurate and visible
checks.description: Verify price tags and promotional signage are current and clearly displayed
checks.pass_criteria: All signs in place, prices accurate, easy to read
checks.fail_criteria: Missing signs, wrong prices, or illegible tags
checks.image_prompt: Photo of product display with pricing/signage visible

checks.title: Checkout area clean and organized
checks.description: Check that registers, counters, and queuing area are tidy and professional
checks.pass_criteria: Clean counters, organized impulse items, clear queue line
checks.fail_criteria: Cluttered counters, disorganized products, or unclear queuing

checks.title: Shelves well-stocked and faced
checks.description: Verify products are properly stocked with labels facing forward
checks.pass_criteria: Full shelves, products faced forward, no empty spots
checks.fail_criteria: Many empty spaces, products turned backwards, or disheveled appearance

checks.title: Staff visible and approachable
checks.description: Check that team members are present on floor with clean uniforms/name tags
checks.pass_criteria: Staff visible, professional appearance, name tags worn
checks.fail_criteria: No staff visible, unprofessional appearance, or missing name tags
checks.image_prompt: Photo showing staff member in store environment
